role_description: An Ansible role that installs Elastic Agent and enrolls in Fleet
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Elastic Agent and enrolls in Fleet. Elastic Agent is a single, unified way to add monitoring for logs, metrics, and other types of data to each host. A single agent makes it easier and faster to deploy monitoring across your infrastructure. The agent’s single, unified policy makes it easier to add integrations for new data sources.
